meanings.definition: A substance that causes dilation of the pupil.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used mydriatics to make my pupils bigger for the eye exam.
meanings.sent2: During the eye check-up, the optometrist applied mydriatics to dilate my pupils.
meanings.sent3: The mydriatics made my eyes look like I was surprised all the time!
meanings.sent4: Her gaze, widened by the mydriatics, seemed to pierce through my soul.
meanings.sent5: The effect of the mydriatics was like opening a window to a brighter world.

meanings.definition: Medications used to dilate the pupil for medical examination.
meanings.sent1: After administering the mydriatics, the doctor could examine my eyes more thoroughly.
meanings.sent2: The mydriatics helped the ophthalmologist get a clearer view of my eye's inner structures.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the mydriatics turned my eyes into big black holes!
meanings.sent4: The mydriatics transformed my vision, revealing details I had never noticed before.
meanings.sent5: The mydriatics painted my world in a new light, revealing hidden beauty.
